adrenaline_rush.name: Adrenaline Rush
adrenaline_rush.description: Enter a state of heightened awareness, increasing all damage and speed.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: Strike from stealth, dealing massive damage. Only usable while stealthed.

arcane_explosion.name: Arcane Explosion
arcane_explosion.description: Release a burst of arcane energy, damaging all nearby enemies.

arcane_missile.name: Arcane Missile
arcane_missile.description: Launch multiple arcane missiles at your target.

arcane_power.name: Arcane Power
arcane_power.description: Enter a state of pure arcane power, dramatically increasing spell damage.

archaeology.name: Archaeology
archaeology.description: Excavate ancient artifacts and relics from dig sites

armor_break.name: Armor Break
armor_break.description: Shatter enemy armor, reducing their defense permanently for the battle.

assassinate.name: Assassinate
assassinate.description: Execute a powerful finishing move that deals massive damage to low-health enemies.

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.description: Strike from behind for massive damage.

basic_attack.name: Basic Attack
basic_attack.description: A standard melee or ranged attack.

battle_cry.name: Battle Cry
battle_cry.description: Let out a mighty battle cry, increasing attack power for a short time.

berserker_rage.name: Berserker Rage
berserker_rage.description: Enter a rage that increases your attack damage.

blacksmithing.name: Blacksmithing
blacksmithing.description: Forge weapons and armor from metal

blade_flurry.name: Blade Flurry
blade_flurry.description: Strike all nearby enemies with rapid blade attacks.

blink.name: Blink
blink.description: Instantly teleport a short distance, avoiding damage.

block.name: Block
block.description: Raise your shield or weapon to block incoming attacks.

bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
bloodlust.description: Each kill increases your attack speed and damage temporarily.

chain_lightning.name: Chain Lightning
chain_lightning.description: Cast a bolt of lightning that jumps between multiple enemies.

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: Rush towards an enemy, dealing damage and stunning them briefly.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description: A powerful melee attack that strikes multiple enemies.

cloak_of_shadows.name: Cloak of Shadows
cloak_of_shadows.description: Become immune to magical effects for a short duration.

combustion.name: Combustion
combustion.description: Cause your fire spells to have a chance to explode for additional damage.

counterattack.name: Counterattack
counterattack.description: When you successfully block or dodge, counterattack with increased damage.

cripple.name: Cripple
cripple.description: Cripple an enemy, significantly reducing their movement and attack speed.

crippling_poison.name: Crippling Poison
crippling_poison.description: Apply a poison that slows enemies and reduces their attack speed.

critical_mastery.name: Critical Mastery
critical_mastery.description: Increases critical strike damage and chance.

deadly_poison.name: Deadly Poison
deadly_poison.description: Apply a lethal poison that deals heavy damage over time.

death_mark.name: Death Mark
death_mark.description: Mark an enemy for death. When they die, you gain significant bonuses.

defensive_stance.name: Defensive Stance
defensive_stance.description: Enter a defensive stance, increasing defense and reducing damage taken.

demoralize.name: Demoralize
demoralize.description: Reduce enemy attack power and movement speed significantly.

devastate.name: Devastate
devastate.description: A crushing blow that reduces enemy armor.

dispel_magic.name: Dispel Magic
dispel_magic.description: Remove all magical effects from a target.

divination.name: Divination
divination.description: Gather energy and essence from the environment

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Increase your chance to avoid attacks entirely.

dual_wield.name: Dual Wield
dual_wield.description: Master the art of wielding two weapons.

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: Dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration.

execute.name: Execute
execute.description: Deal massive damage to an enemy with low health.

expose_armor.name: Expose Armor
expose_armor.description: Strike at weak points, reducing enemy armor.

fan_of_knives.name: Fan of Knives
fan_of_knives.description: Throw knives in all directions, hitting all nearby enemies.

fire_armor.name: Fire Armor
fire_armor.description: Surround yourself with flames, dealing damage to melee attackers.

fire_nova.name: Fire Nova
fire_nova.description: Create an explosion of fire that burns all nearby enemies.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Hurl a ball of fire at your enemies.

first_aid.name: First Aid
first_aid.description: Quickly bandage your wounds, restoring a moderate amount of health.

fishing.name: Fishing
fishing.description: Catch fish and aquatic resources from water

foraging.name: Foraging
foraging.description: Find wild fruits, berries, and mushrooms

frost_armor.name: Frost Armor
frost_armor.description: Encase yourself in ice, increasing defense and slowing attackers.

frost_bolt.name: Frost Bolt
frost_bolt.description: Launch a bolt of ice that slows the target.

frost_nova.name: Frost Nova
frost_nova.description: Create an explosion of ice that freezes all nearby enemies.

frostbite.name: Frostbite
frostbite.description: Cause enemies to suffer from frostbite, taking damage over time.

fury.name: Fury
fury.description: Increases critical strike chance and damage for a short duration.

garrote.name: Garrote
garrote.description: Silently strangle an enemy from behind, dealing damage and silencing them.

herbalism.name: Herbalism
herbalism.description: Gather herbs and plants for alchemy and cooking

heroic_leap.name: Heroic Leap
heroic_leap.description: Leap to a target location, dealing damage to enemies in the area.

hunting.name: Hunting
hunting.description: Track and hunt animals for resources

ice_lance.name: Ice Lance
ice_lance.description: Hurl a sharp shard of ice that pierces through enemies.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.description: Intimidate enemies, reducing their attack power.

item_mastery.name: Item Mastery
item_mastery.description: Increases the effectiveness of all consumable items.

kidney_shot.name: Kidney Shot
kidney_shot.description: Strike a vital point, stunning the enemy.

last_stand.name: Last Stand
last_stand.description: When health drops below 20%, gain massive defense and health regeneration.

lethal_injection.name: Lethal Injection
lethal_injection.description: Inject a deadly poison that deals massive damage over time.

lightning_armor.name: Lightning Armor
lightning_armor.description: Envelop yourself in lightning, shocking nearby enemies.

lucky_strike.name: Lucky Strike
lucky_strike.description: Increases your luck, improving critical strike chance and item find rate.

mage_intellect.name: Mage's Intellect
mage_intellect.description: Passively increases intelligence and magic power.

magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
magic_missile.description: Fire multiple homing missiles that never miss their target.

mana_burn.name: Mana Burn
mana_burn.description: Burn an enemy's mana, dealing damage based on their mana pool.

mana_shield.name: Mana Shield
mana_shield.description: Create a shield that absorbs damage using mana.

mana_surge.name: Mana Surge
mana_surge.description: Instantly restore a large amount of mana.

marked_for_death.name: Marked for Death
marked_for_death.description: Mark an enemy, causing all attacks against them to deal bonus damage.

meteor.name: Meteor
meteor.description: Summon a massive meteor from the sky, dealing devastating damage to a large area.

mining.name: Mining
mining.description: Extract ores and gems from stone deposits

mortal_strike.name: Mortal Strike
mortal_strike.description: A devastating strike that deals extra damage and reduces healing received.

overpower.name: Overpower
overpower.description: An unstoppable attack that ignores enemy defense.

parry.name: Parry
parry.description: Deflect incoming attacks, reducing damage taken.

poison_blade.name: Poison Blade
poison_blade.description: Coat your weapon in poison, causing attacks to poison enemies.

poison_strike.name: Poison Strike
poison_strike.description: Attack with a poisoned blade that deals damage over time.

polymorph.name: Polymorph
polymorph.description: Transform an enemy into a harmless creature, removing them from combat temporarily.

potion_use.name: Potion Use
potion_use.description: Mastery of potions allows you to use them more effectively.

power_strike.name: Power Strike
power_strike.description: A devastating melee attack with increased critical chance.

quick_strike.name: Quick Strike
quick_strike.description: A fast attack that deals moderate damage.

rally.name: Rally
rally.description: Instantly restore a large amount of health and remove negative effects.

reckless_strike.name: Reckless Strike
reckless_strike.description: A powerful attack that deals high damage but leaves you vulnerable.

rend.name: Rend
rend.description: Cause the enemy to bleed, taking damage over time.

runecrafting.name: Runecrafting
runecrafting.description: Inscribe runes on items to enhance their power

rupture.name: Rupture
rupture.description: Tear open an enemy's wounds, causing them to bleed heavily.

scorch.name: Scorch
scorch.description: A quick fire spell that reduces enemy fire resistance.

second_wind.name: Second Wind
second_wind.description: Recover health when your health drops below 30%.

shadow_clone.name: Shadow Clone
shadow_clone.description: Create a shadowy clone that attacks alongside you.

shadow_dance.name: Shadow Dance
shadow_dance.description: Enter a shadowy state allowing stealth abilities to be used without stealth.

shadow_step.name: Shadow Step
shadow_step.description: Teleport behind your enemy and strike.

shadow_strike.name: Shadow Strike
shadow_strike.description: Strike from the shadows, dealing shadow damage that ignores armor.

shield_bash.name: Shield Bash
shield_bash.description: Bash your target with your shield, stunning them.

shield_wall.name: Shield Wall
shield_wall.description: Raise your shield, blocking all incoming damage for a short duration.

slice_and_dice.name: Slice and Dice
slice_and_dice.description: Increase your attack speed dramatically for a short duration.

slow_time.name: Slow Time
slow_time.description: Slow down time in an area, reducing all enemies' speed.

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smoke_bomb.description: Throw a smoke bomb, blinding all enemies and allowing escape.

sneak_attack.name: Sneak Attack
sneak_attack.description: Increase critical strike chance and damage.

spell_steal.name: Spell Steal
spell_steal.description: Steal a beneficial buff from an enemy and apply it to yourself.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: Enter stealth mode, becoming invisible to enemies and increasing critical strike chance.

sunder.name: Sunder
sunder.description: Strike enemy armor, reducing their defense. Stacks up to 3 times.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Teleport to a target location, leaving a magical mark.

thieving.name: Thieving
thieving.description: Pickpocket and steal from NPCs and targets

thunder_clap.name: Thunder Clap
thunder_clap.description: Strike the ground, dealing damage and slowing all nearby enemies.

trapping.name: Trapping
trapping.description: Set traps for animals and monsters

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.description: Instantly enter stealth and remove all negative effects.

vendetta.name: Vendetta
vendetta.description: Mark an enemy for vengeance, dealing increased damage based on damage taken.

victory_rush.name: Victory Rush
victory_rush.description: After defeating an enemy, your next attack deals bonus damage and heals you.

war_cry.name: War Cry
war_cry.description: Increases all allies' attack power and reduces enemy morale.

warrior_strength.name: Warrior's Strength
warrior_strength.description: Passively increases strength and attack power.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.description: Spin in a circle, attacking all nearby enemies.

woodcutting.name: Woodcutting
woodcutting.description: Harvest wood and materials from trees
